Header: Officer Cadets Come to VIR Regimental Headquarters
Content: Officer Cadets of the Sri Lanka Military Academy (SLMA) as part of their course training modules, made a visit to the Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) Headquarters at Boyagane on Sunday (17) and received a comprehensive knowledge on the role and tasks of a Regimental Headquarter. Brigadier Srinatha Ariyasingha, Centre Commandant Regimental Centre VIR welcomed and facilitated the visit of those Officer Cadets on the instructions of Major General Ajith Kariyakarawana, Deputy Chief of Staff & Colonel of the Regiment VIR.
